pkgmetadata.longdescription: highlighting-kate is a syntax highlighting library with support for nearly one hundred languages. The syntax parsers are automatically generated from Kate syntax descriptions (<http://kate-editor.org/>), so any syntax supported by Kate can be added. An (optional) command-line program is provided, along with a utility for generating new parsers from Kate XML syntax descriptions.

use.flag: Use the pcre-light library instead of regex-pcre-builtin.
